Creduto morto piÃ¹ di una decade fa, lo Spettro Ã¨ un uomo che tenta di risanare lâ€™onore perduto servendo il suo padrone come sicario personale. Anni di massacri spietati lâ€™hanno trasformato in un assassino brutale ed efficiente. La sua arma intricata studiata appositamente per combattere i suoi bersagli piÃ¹ comuni gli permette di irretire le sue vittime in una stretta catena e di infliggere cosÃ¬ un colpo letale con lâ€™affilata lama.

Lo Spettro viaggia in lungo e in largo per soddisfare le macabre missioni che gli vengono commissionate dai suoi padroni. Come risultato, lui sacrifica lâ€™armatura pesante tipicamente indossata dai guerrieri della sua terra natale in favore di un abbigliamento piÃ¹ leggero che gli consente di manovrare piÃ¹ facilmente la sua arma letale. La lama e la catena che porta con sÃ© puÃ² essere usata in molti e nefasti modi. PuÃ² lanciare la parte affilata per lacerare ed uccidere le sue vittime o scegliere di utilizzare la parte smussata per stordirli e renderli un bersaglio piÃ¹ facile.

Un assassino minaccioso privo di emozioni, lo Spettro ha imparato ad agire con piÃ¹ efficienza nel buio della notte. Nonostante la sua stazza lui Ã¨ paurosamente silenzioso, e usa questa sua innato talento a suo vantaggio. Riesce a colpire, inosservato, dalle ombre riuscendo a sorprendere persino le creature che vivono naturalmente nellâ€™oscuritÃ .
A worthless kill. It does not lessen the price I must pay.
I will die a second time, and it will be as pathetic as my first death!
I have not paid my full due! I will die forgotten!
I have collected a decade's worth of souls, yet it will all be for nothing!
I have traded hundreds of lives for my own, but it will not save me in this moment!
Have the Shoguns sent you?! Have they broken their deal?!
You seek to end me? I will not allow such when I am so close to redemption!
Hmph. Spineless assassins, sent to ensure I never finish my deed.
Betrayal is afoot. I will not be fooled again.
Come to claim the bounty on my head? It will be your last mistake.
I was stabbed through the heart, and it was the best thing I had ever felt.
These chains wrap tightly around me. It is pleasing.
I am always in agony, and I have learned to find solace in it.
Where there is pain, there can be pleasure.
In the anguish of my punctured heart, I have found peace.
Insufferable. You have not been trained properly for this task.
You let emotion drive your actions. You are undisciplined, unskilled.
You are all disappointments. Glimmers of potential, snuffed out by incompetence.
You have no pride, no honor. You follow the same damned path as I do.
I have fallen from grace, and now I must sulk in the dark with these wretches.
I will offer the heads of men, women, and children to redeem my name.
The life of these peasants to restore my glory? I would accept without hesitation.
I failed because I cared for another. That will not happen again.
I am uncaring, distanced, remorseless.
I have been given a task, and I will complete it no matter the sacrifice.
Even after a decade of unfeeling slaughter, I still yearn for his touch...
I had become too attached, and it twisted me into the monster I am now...
My students...I was weak, and I failed them all...
Behind this grim visage, a broken man...
My heart, it still aches for the love I thought I shared...
I am the reaper. I am the jailor. I AM DEATH!
I have died once already! I am a vengeful revenant on the hunt for blood!
Is this the afterlife? If so, it is rather droll.
I am an unholy creature, a demon walking the earth!
I am the Aspect of Death! All will fall to my blade!
Combat is an art, and I have mastered it to the fullest.
My name will be remembered. My past mistakes will be erased!
Hmph, I have seen worse.
I have killed many men, all of which were far more fearsome than this rabble.
I am close to paying my debt in full. I cannot fail now.
My name will be redeemed. I will be remembered as an honorable warrior.
I am a monster of a man. These beasts will know fear.
I do not flinch in the face of terror. I do not hesitate to kill.
I have survived a fatal blow in the past. What more could possibly stop me.
Only when my past sins have been cleansed will I finally accept my second death.
I have died once already. I have no reason to fear death again.
My younger self would struggle to face such horrors, but I am not that man.
I am fearless in the face of demonic entities. Let my courage inspire you.
A master leads through action. Let my bravery serve as your guide.
Strike with purpose. An attack is useless if it lacks conviction.
There is always a weakness. Find it and you will be the victor.
Emotions are a powerful thing. Use them to your benefit.
Know that to die with honor is a greater fate than to live in cowardice!
Hmph, I will shrug it off.
This is nothing I have not dealt with before.
We will die as cowards, forgotten in this domain of demons!
In all my years, I have never fought a foe so baleful, so malevolent!
There will be no glory in our deaths. Only torment and suffering!
You work for the Shoguns, and you have come to ensure the debt is never paid!
You seek to undermine my task! I will let no one stop me from restoring my honor!
I trusted another once, and it led to my first death. That will not happen again!
Death is so, so cold. Pain will allow me to feel warmth again!
Where a heart would be, I bear a scar instead, for pain invokes the strongest emotions!
The blade. It is a beautiful mistress that can take away the burdens of life!
I was a teacher once, but there is nothing I could teach to fools like you.
I have sacrificed my humanity to redeem my name. What have you accomplished?
You will die as I have. Shamed and forgotten.
If the Shoguns decreed it, I would offer them your lives in a heartbeat.
I have killed many innocents in my quest to preserve my honor. I do not plan to stop.
My reputation is what matters. I will be praised in my first life and feared in this one.
Even if I restore my name, the killing will burden me for the rest of my years...
I was to guide a new generation to glory, but instead I lead them to their demise...
I was praised, respected, and I foolishly threw it all away...
Innocent souls taste the best. So juicy and succulent!
This chain is wrapped around my arm twelve times. That is twice more than six!
I prefer my demonic deities over your eldritch entities.
The shadows serve as my ally. The unseen warrior is the one to live!
Flee as a coward or die as a coward, the choice is obvious!
Peril presents itself, and I must survive!
I must keep a watchful eye, lest you fiends decide to end my life abruptly!
I have dealt with rival assassins before, I will not be so easily caught!
You are honorless vermin. I will not allow you to stab me in the back!
Death was not so bad. A second death should be as painless as the first!
I know no fear. I will face these creatures head on!
An exemplary warrior would not back down in the face of such ferocity!
Demonic brethren! Let us embrace each other!
Come closer, I wish to taste your fear.
Haha! Look at how they flee before me!
Like an unholy phantom, I will vanish from sight.
Noooooooo! They bear the symbols of my anathema!
The Light is too bright! I will retreat to the shadows!
What little honor I have left, I will preserve with a selfless sacrifice...
My name is in ruins. I may as well accept my fate and be forgotten...
As who I was fades away, so too shall I...
I-I am shameful! I seek to flee from this hellscape!
I-I am a coward! I do not possess the will to complete what must be done!
T-they speak the truth! I am a lowly rat, fleeing to the safety of the shadows!
The kill belongs to me! Every life I take brings me closer to my goal!
I am a true warrior! Move aside!
I will be the one to strike the final blow!
You will face danger first, seeing as you have little to attribute to your name.
I have learned that the key to survival is to let a fool take your place!
A teacher watches his students, and you will be my student today!
The fear of failure, of my wasted efforts, it paralyzes me!
I-it happens once more! My emotions cause me to hesitate!
Memories return! Flashes of that terrible night!
He who strikes first, will surely fall for the traitor's trap.
A preemptive strike is too risky. I will wait for the rats to reveal themselves.
I am a patient man. The assassins will strike and I will steal their final breath.
A master should not have to waste his efforts.
I am getting on in years. You younger ones can take over in my place.
I have a deadened heart. Give me a moment to rest.
I have done this dreadful deed for years, and I have lost all hope to completing it...
Years later, I still hesitate to do what must be done...
I must remain still, like a lion's statue.
If I do not move, they will fail to detect me.
They will get over here. I must simply wait.
Your orders will lead me to an untimely demise. I will do what I know is best!
I will not obey someone so young and naive!
In this strange land I listen to only one master, and that is me!
Passion of a different nature takes over me!
I am a feral animal, unable to deny my basest instincts!
I am an emotional creature, and I cannot deny it!
I have performed this bloody act for two lifetimes. I know what I am doing.
Here. Witness an example of true skill.
How absurd. I must show you half-wits how to fight in the midst of live combat.
The kill is mine!
Away with you! I will have this glory and you cannot stop me!
He who lands the killing blow is the one to claim the glory!
I have lost my will! My actions are misguided!
I am lost in a daze! I have lost purpose!
I have strayed from the path. I do not know the right course of action!
RAWR!!!
Behold, my demonic wrath!
I have a touch of death. Beware!
I have been given a second life and I risk it delving into these blackened catacombs.
What is honor if we are to die a horrible death...
The life of a warrior is too rife with risk. I should retire and become a farmer instead.
It is when I am most comfortable, that the killers and cutthroats decide to emerge.
Even when beaten and exhausted, I will not be an easy target for you.
Try as you might, the silence of night makes poor cover for your clumsy footsteps.
Brand me with the outcastâ€™s mark so that I may embody the suffering I hold within!
I bear many scars from many battles, but I hold the most grisly of them within!
I wear this mask to hide my shame, but I will bear the wounds of battle proudly!
You are not worthy of life. You are nothing.
Best me in combat and you will prove you are strong. You know you cannot.
In my home, you would be viewed as less than even the farmers.
I am a foreign visitor to these lands. Treat me with the utmost respect.
Give me the heads of your kills, so that I may present them and take credit.
You are all outcasts. You are beneath me and must serve my will.
I continue to think on the events of that night, and it continues to sadden me...
I never saw him again. I will never know why he did what he did...
All this killing, this bloodshed, it has eroded my soul...
Shall we slaughter a chicken and pay our dues to a bloodthirsty god?
Do you have a skewer? Souls taste best when roasted over hellfire.
Shing. Shing. I am imitating the battle cry of my weapon.
I am an unkillable man. Try to prove me wrong.
Try to harm me. I dare you.
I welcome the pain. I fear nothing.
Even if it will not restore my former glory, I will face death without fear...
I will be forgotten, but I will still die with dignity...
HAHAHAHAHA!
You are foolish to think that a vengeful spirit like me has a weakness!
Watch as I carve my own flesh, and know that you cannot hope to harm me.
I feel no pain. You do not believe me? Watch.
Cursed to a second life, perhaps it is best that I rest...
I have no hope of restoring my once proud image. This is the only option...
Haha! Bloody blades are my favorite delicacy!
I will rip my chest open, to prove that I am indeed a heartless demon!
You plot your escape route? I will not allow you!
With no smoke or mirrors, you will not escape my presence.
The coward's path leads to nothingness. What greater shame is there?
We will be greeted with contempt for our cowardice. Let us die a noble death...
Let us fight on! We will be remembered for our audacious nature!
Scars. Pain. Death. It is not to be feared, it is to be embraced!
I will not be banished! Not yet!
Wait! I have not had my fill!
My life flashes before me, just like that dreadful night!
Will I die a second time? Will there be a third life?!
So your ploy has begun? You seek to end my life here?
Your ambush begins, but I will not allow you victory!
You are my devoted serfs! You should be shielding me from danger!
Cowards! Eager to save yourselves rather than protect your lord!
Hahaha! I barely even felt that!
Oh, that will scar. Excellent!
Good try, but you should have aimed for the head.
They strike without salt and vinegar. Their attacks do not affect me!
I have died once already. It was not so bad.
Oof. That was a fatal blow, or was it? *wink wink*
If I am to die, let me die! I cannot stand this torture!
Kill me or let me live! Do not torment me like this!
I am no fool. Your monstrous allies are easy to predict.
I have faced your kind before. You always act the same.
What? Too scared to fight a demon?
I am a wide man. Surely it is not that hard to hit me.
Hehe. Trying to box with a shadow? Hehe.
Blades and claws tainted in darkness? Mmm, my favorite.
You fool! Now I must search for a different soul to claim!
You are proud of your triumph, but you only hinder me and my quest.
Did I say you could strike? I did not, you impudent child.
You attack recklessly, no discipline. You should feel ashamed.
Look at these simple creatures, fighting their meaningless fight. Haha!
Ah, the affairs of mortal beings. How quaint.
They have proven their skill in combat, let us leave now before it is too late!
A warrior knows when to back down, and it would be best that we do!
Merely an act. I know that you conspire with these monstrosities.
A convincing performance to some, but not to me.
Careless, brutish. You strike poorly and will be slain as a result.
*shakes head* You are an embarrassment to us all.
Phew. If you landed that blow, I would have been furious.
Nice try, but that kill is meant for someone more worthy, such as me.
Perhaps they are demons? Perhaps they are my kin?
Pft. Should have aimed for the heart.
Again and again, I am always last to suffer!
No! My peers and companions, slaughtered before me once more!
Good. That makes things simple.
Taken by the fiends. A fitting fate for a betrayer.
How does it feel? Is it like a sword through the heart?
Pain puts hair on the chest. I could use some too!
Let this be a lesson to all of you. Do not be this fool.
You lack grace, finesse. You are injured because you do not listen.
Oh yum! Let me suck on the wound!
Oh how kind of you to spill blood for me! I was getting rather parched!
An act of mercy? No, an act of torment! They toy with us!
We have not been maimed. Now is an opportune time to withdraw!
You do not fool me. Your prancing only serves to entertain me.
You think I believe your little act? I know real bloodlust when I see it.
Aw, no drink for me? Now I am sad.
Hehehe. Did you like my smoke bomb?
I am immobilized with fear! I am to suffer the same death again!
No, stop! I WANT OUT!
Moving me into the center of your trap? I will not fall for it.
You seek to put me in a disadvantageous position, but I will not allow it.
Hnnngh! No! I want to FEEEEEEEEEEEEL!
Sorry, my legs are shaking with pain and pleasure.
Be patient, you imp, or I will beat the patience into you.
Disobey me, and the end of my blade will be your new teacher.
Stop, unless you seek to be possessed demonically!
Halt! I am the warden and you need to get back into your cell!
Foreign medicines and apparatus are things I will not accept.
Hmm. Probably poisoned. I will pass.
What is this? AID?! No thanks.
Pft. I do not need this. I am a hardy man!
Do not give things to a vagrant, it is unwise...
You give to a lesser man. It will only hinder you in the future...
Ew. Bring me a stillborn child and we will talk.
Is it the key to my heart?
Your strange eldritch ways unnerve me.
I prefer traditional methods, not your unorthodox ones.
What is the cost of this treatment? I will not pay a debt that I do not know.
No! Let my heart bleed!
I am already dead, inside and out. Do not try to change me.
Away with you. You mettle in my affairs and it irritates me!
Why mend a broken soul? Let what is dying, die...
It is not enough. It will never be enough...
Heal my mind or heal nothing at all, for it is all pointless...
What kind of trickery is this? Flesh does not just magically heal!
I would like some herbal tea before we begin please.
Do you have anything to cure my undead state?
Gifts never come without a cost, and I suspect the cost is my life!
I have no need of aid, especially not that of a stranger!
Trying to appeal to my interests? I am not so easily swayed!
I do not need your aid to relish in this pain.
No. Let me enjoy my eternal suffering.
I do not need comfort. I will be strong.
To bolster me, would be to bolster a crumbling fortress...
It will not restore my honor. It will not restore who I am...
You would only be dragged down with me...
Your attempts to bless me will only end in my agonizing demise.
No no! What you are doing is an exorcism ritual. That is not what we want!
Please. I do not need to be stamped with seals of power.
It is fine to build relations with your allies, but do not let it be a hindrance.
Even in this dreary abode, know that you are worth something.
In my homeland, many die forgotten and unmourned. This will not happen to you.
I bear many scars from many encounters. Time will heal all your wounds.
After every battle, you must care to your wounds so that you may fight on.
I have mastered many techniques, but the art of healing is the most essential.
We are all lost in our ways, but soon we will find our path.
Do not let your camaraderie become a burden. I speak from experience.
Despite my dispassionate and grim demeanor, I do care for your well-being.
Thoughts of inadequacy plague my mind. I am sure to fail!
How can I call myself a master when I have faltered so much!
It is pointless. We are all doomed to the void and that time is now!
I have never needed help with my duty, and that will not change today.
Their ways are strange, and likely malicious in purpose.
I am alone in this strange place. I can trust no one.
I have been pulling out my teeth and cutting up my gums. Want to see?
These horns are very sharp. They will work nicely as hooks for my skin!
Let way. I must heat my blade so that it will cut cleanly into my flesh!
I will not let talentless fools drag me down with them.
I cannot hope to teach these mongrels anything.
Useless. These ones are too stubborn to learn my teachings.
I was a mentor to others once. Not anymore.
I have been alone for a decade. I can manage without them.
There is no benefit in aiding these outsiders.
I would only make things worse...
My touch is that of a vagrant. It would be best if I kept to myself...
For my services, one of you will have to offer me your firstborn.
Is there a lamb we can slaughter? It is mandatory.
WE BE DEMONS. That is all.
Devious. To disguise malice as good will is most cowardly.
Your methods are unconventional. I will not be subject to them.
Your dirty foreign hands will not touch me!
I like it rough.
Let us spar. You will use a blade, I will use my fists!
Here. Carve the mark of shame into my back!
I will not allow your grimey hands anywhere near me.
There is nothing you can do. Do not try to act otherwise.
You think you can help? I will inform you that you are terribly mistaken.
Please. It is not wise to offer kindness to a disgrace like me...
I am ashamed. I cannot possibly accept a kindness in this state...
I am worth less than an outcast. Leave me...
Pfft. Good luck, I am incorporeal!
Hissssssssss!
Poison in the grain. A coward's weapon.
This meal is laced in toxins. I know of your deceit.
I must trim the fat so that only muscle remains!
Fasting is a common practice in my homeland. I will demonstrate!
I am below even the peasants of my social caste. I do not deserve food...
I have no need for mortal food. I am already dead!
Bread and water will not sate me. I must feed on the hearts of my enemies!
You were promised coin for my head. Instead, you will taste the edge of my blade!
You. You are the assassin and your life ends now!
A disgraceful display. You deserve the death that comes for you!
Pitiful. To die by my hand is the only honor I can offer you!
You. Your soul is mine!
I am the Reaper, and I decree that your time is done!
I come closer to my redemption...
Find peace in death, it is the only mercy I can bestow.
I was master of my art, and I still am.
I am Death.
One by one, they will fall.
Another added to the tally.
I have had steel pierce my beating heart, I am no mortal man.
I see how I will depart. Shamed and forgotten...
I must survive! I must redeem my name and fix my past mistakes!
Do what must be done. My sacrifice will restore the honor I have lost so long ago.

Will I finally be laid to rest?
A Man Made Demon
An assassin from foreign lands, wielding a peculiar weapon of blade and chain. It is unknown what his intentions are in our pitiful estate, but he offers his grisly expertise to your cause.
The Dishonored
Stripped of their nobility and banished from their homes, these wandering warriors seek to save what little dignity they have left by joining the broken ranks of your estate.

The man I was is no more. Compassion is a weakness that will lead to failure.
I am as silent as the sleeping dead. My foes will be unbeknownst to their demise.
I have slain many to redeem myself. I am a quick and efficient killer.
Even in pure blackness, the darkest caverns can be navigated.

Garment

Believed to have been killed more than a decade ago, the Wraith is a man seeking to redeem his dishonored name by serving as his masterâ€™s personal assassin. Years of heartless slaughter has shaped him into a brutal and efficient killer. Using an intricate weapon made to counter his most common targets, the Wraith ensnares his victims in tightening chains before delivering a fatal blow with the bladed side of his wicked tool.

The Wraith travels to many faraway places to fulfill the grisly deeds given to him by his masters. As a result, he sacrifices the heavier armor commonly worn by warriors of his homeland in favor of lighter attire that also allows him the freedom of movement to use his deadly weapon. The blade and chain he wields is used with frightening flexibility. He can fling the bladed side to lacerate and execute his victims or use the blunt side as a flail to incapacitate his foes.

A menacing assassin with no emotions, the Wraith has learned to be most effective in the dark of the night. He is eerily silent despite his physique, and he uses this to his advantage. He can strike unseen from the shadows, besting even creatures that live entirely in blackness.

ì‹­ìˆ˜ë…„ë„ ì „ì— ì‚´í•´ë˜ì—ˆë‹¤ê³ ì•Œë ¤ì§„ ì´ ìžëŠ”, ì£¼êµ°ì˜ ì•”ì‚´ìž ì—­í• ì„ ìžì²˜í•¨ìœ¼ë¡œì¨ ì‹¤ì¶”ëœ ëª…ì„ êµ¬ì›ë°›ê³ ìž í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ê·¸ëŠ” ëƒ‰í˜¹í•œ ë„ì‚´ìžë¡œì„œ ì‚´ì•„ê°”ê³ , ì„¸ì›”ì„ ê±°ë“­í•˜ë©° ìž”ì¸í•˜ê³ íš¨ìœ¨ì ì¸ ì‚´ì¸ê·€ë¡œ ë³€ëª¨ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ì—¬ëŸ¬ ìƒí™©ì—ì„œ ì‘ìš©í• ìˆ˜ ìžˆëŠ” ì‚¬ìŠ¬ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬, ë§ë ¹ì€ í¬ìƒìžë“¤ì„ íŒ½íŒ½í•œ ì‚¬ìŠ¬ë¡œ ì˜­ì•„ë§¨ í›„ ê·¸ ì‚¬ì•…í•œ ë„êµ¬ì˜ ë‚ ë¶™ì´ ë¶€ë¶„ìœ¼ë¡œ ì£½ìŒì„ ì„ ì‚¬í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

ë§ë ¹ì€ ì£¼êµ°ì´ íŠ¹ì‚¬í•œ ìž„ë¬´ë¥¼ ìˆ˜í–‰í•˜ê³ ìž ìˆ˜ë§Žì€ ì™¸ì§€ë¡œ ì—¬í–‰í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ê·¸ëŠ” ì¹˜ëª…ì ì¸ ë¬´ê¸°ë¥¼ ìžìœ ìžìž¬ë¡œ ìš´ìš©ì¼€ í•˜ëŠ” ê°€ë²¼ìš´ ì˜ë³µì„ ì„ í˜¸í•˜ì—¬ ê³ í–¥ì˜ ì „ì‚¬ë“¤ì´ í†µìƒì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ë¬´ê±°ìš´ ê°‘ì˜·ì€ í¬ìƒí•˜ê²Œ ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. íœ˜ë‘ë¥´ëŠ” ì‚¬ìŠ¬ê³¼ ì¹¼ë‚ ì€ ë¬´ì„­ë„ë¡ ìœ ì—°í•˜ë©°, ë§ë ¹ì€ ì¹¼ë‚ ìª½ì„ íˆ¬ì²™í•˜ì—¬ í¬ìƒìžë“¤ì„ ì°¢ì–´ë°œê¸°ê±°ë‚˜ ë­‰íˆ­í•œ ìª½ì„ ì² í‡´ì²˜ëŸ¼ ì´ìš©í•˜ì—¬ ì ë“¤ì„ ë¬´ë ¥í™”í• ìˆ˜ ìžˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

ê°ì •ì„ ë‚´ë¹„ì¹˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ” ìœ„í˜‘ì ì¸ ì•”ì‚´ìžì¸ ë§ë ¹ì€ ë°¤ì˜ ì–´ë‘ ì†ì—ì„œ ìµœê³ ì˜ ê¸°ëŸ‰ì„ ë½ë‚´ëŠ” ë²•ì„ ë°°ì› ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ê°•ê±´í•œ í’ì±„ë¥¼ ì§€ë…”ìŒì—ë„ ì†ì‰½ê²Œ ì–´ë‘ ì†ìœ¼ë¡œ ë…¹ì•„ë“¤ ìˆ˜ ìžˆìœ¼ë©°, ì´ê²ƒì„ ìžì‹ ì˜ ê°•ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‚¬ìš©í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ê·¸ë¦¼ìžì— ìˆ¨ì–´ì„œ ê³µê²©í•˜ëŠ” ê·¸ì˜ ëŠ¥ë ¥ì€ ì‹¬ì§€ì–´ í‘ì•” ì†ì—ì„œë§Œ ì‚´ì•„ì˜¨ ìƒë¬¼ë“¤ì„ ëŠ¥ê°€í•˜ê¸°ë„ í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
A worthless kill. It does not lessen the price I must pay.
I will die a second time, and it will be as pathetic as my first death!
I have not paid my full due! I will die forgotten!
I have collected a decade's worth of souls, yet it will all be for nothing!
I have traded hundreds of lives for my own, but it will not save me in this moment!
Have the Shoguns sent you?! Have they broken their deal?!
You seek to end me? I will not allow such when I am so close to redemption!
Hmph. Spineless assassins, sent to ensure I never finish my deed.
Betrayal is afoot. I will not be fooled again.
Come to claim the bounty on my head? It will be your last mistake.
I was stabbed through the heart, and it was the best thing I had ever felt.
These chains wrap tightly around me. It is pleasing.
I am always in agony, and I have learned to find solace in it.
Where there is pain, there can be pleasure.
In the anguish of my punctured heart, I have found peace.
Insufferable. You have not been trained properly for this task.
You let emotion drive your actions. You are undisciplined, unskilled.
You are all disappointments. Glimmers of potential, snuffed out by incompetence.
You have no pride, no honor. You follow the same damned path as I do.
I have fallen from grace, and now I must sulk in the dark with these wretches.
I will offer the heads of men, women, and children to redeem my name.
The life of these peasants to restore my glory? I would accept without hesitation.
I failed because I cared for another. That will not happen again.
I am uncaring, distanced, remorseless.
I have been given a task, and I will complete it no matter the sacrifice.
Even after a decade of unfeeling slaughter, I still yearn for his touch...
I had become too attached, and it twisted me into the monster I am now...
My students...I was weak, and I failed them all...
Behind this grim visage, a broken man...
My heart, it still aches for the love I thought I shared...
I am the reaper. I am the jailor. I AM DEATH!
I have died once already! I am a vengeful revenant on the hunt for blood!
Is this the afterlife? If so, it is rather droll.
I am an unholy creature, a demon walking the earth!
I am the Aspect of Death! All will fall to my blade!
Combat is an art, and I have mastered it to the fullest.
My name will be remembered. My past mistakes will be erased!
Hmph, I have seen worse.
I have killed many men, all of which were far more fearsome than this rabble.
I am close to paying my debt in full. I cannot fail now.
My name will be redeemed. I will be remembered as an honorable warrior.
I am a monster of a man. These beasts will know fear.
I do not flinch in the face of terror. I do not hesitate to kill.
I have survived a fatal blow in the past. What more could possibly stop me.
Only when my past sins have been cleansed will I finally accept my second death.
I have died once already. I have no reason to fear death again.
My younger self would struggle to face such horrors, but I am not that man.
I am fearless in the face of demonic entities. Let my courage inspire you.
A master leads through action. Let my bravery serve as your guide.
Strike with purpose. An attack is useless if it lacks conviction.
There is always a weakness. Find it and you will be the victor.
Emotions are a powerful thing. Use them to your benefit.
Know that to die with honor is a greater fate than to live in cowardice!
Hmph, I will shrug it off.
This is nothing I have not dealt with before.
We will die as cowards, forgotten in this domain of demons!
In all my years, I have never fought a foe so baleful, so malevolent!
There will be no glory in our deaths. Only torment and suffering!
You work for the Shoguns, and you have come to ensure the debt is never paid!
You seek to undermine my task! I will let no one stop me from restoring my honor!
I trusted another once, and it led to my first death. That will not happen again!
Death is so, so cold. Pain will allow me to feel warmth again!
Where a heart would be, I bear a scar instead, for pain invokes the strongest emotions!
The blade. It is a beautiful mistress that can take away the burdens of life!
I was a teacher once, but there is nothing I could teach to fools like you.
I have sacrificed my humanity to redeem my name. What have you accomplished?
You will die as I have. Shamed and forgotten.
If the Shoguns decreed it, I would offer them your lives in a heartbeat.
I have killed many innocents in my quest to preserve my honor. I do not plan to stop.
My reputation is what matters. I will be praised in my first life and feared in this one.
Even if I restore my name, the killing will burden me for the rest of my years...
I was to guide a new generation to glory, but instead I lead them to their demise...
I was praised, respected, and I foolishly threw it all away...
Innocent souls taste the best. So juicy and succulent!
This chain is wrapped around my arm twelve times. That is twice more than six!
I prefer my demonic deities over your eldritch entities.
The shadows serve as my ally. The unseen warrior is the one to live!
Flee as a coward or die as a coward, the choice is obvious!
Peril presents itself, and I must survive!
I must keep a watchful eye, lest you fiends decide to end my life abruptly!
I have dealt with rival assassins before, I will not be so easily caught!
You are honorless vermin. I will not allow you to stab me in the back!
Death was not so bad. A second death should be as painless as the first!
I know no fear. I will face these creatures head on!
An exemplary warrior would not back down in the face of such ferocity!
Demonic brethren! Let us embrace each other!
Come closer, I wish to taste your fear.
Haha! Look at how they flee before me!
Like an unholy phantom, I will vanish from sight.
Noooooooo! They bear the symbols of my anathema!
The Light is too bright! I will retreat to the shadows!
What little honor I have left, I will preserve with a selfless sacrifice...
My name is in ruins. I may as well accept my fate and be forgotten...
As who I was fades away, so too shall I...
I-I am shameful! I seek to flee from this hellscape!
I-I am a coward! I do not possess the will to complete what must be done!
T-they speak the truth! I am a lowly rat, fleeing to the safety of the shadows!
The kill belongs to me! Every life I take brings me closer to my goal!
I am a true warrior! Move aside!
I will be the one to strike the final blow!
You will face danger first, seeing as you have little to attribute to your name.
I have learned that the key to survival is to let a fool take your place!
A teacher watches his students, and you will be my student today!
The fear of failure, of my wasted efforts, it paralyzes me!
I-it happens once more! My emotions cause me to hesitate!
Memories return! Flashes of that terrible night!
He who strikes first, will surely fall for the traitor's trap.
A preemptive strike is too risky. I will wait for the rats to reveal themselves.
I am a patient man. The assassins will strike and I will steal their final breath.
A master should not have to waste his efforts.
I am getting on in years. You younger ones can take over in my place.
I have a deadened heart. Give me a moment to rest.
I have done this dreadful deed for years, and I have lost all hope to completing it...
Years later, I still hesitate to do what must be done...
I must remain still, like a lion's statue.
If I do not move, they will fail to detect me.
They will get over here. I must simply wait.
Your orders will lead me to an untimely demise. I will do what I know is best!
I will not obey someone so young and naive!
In this strange land I listen to only one master, and that is me!
Passion of a different nature takes over me!
I am a feral animal, unable to deny my basest instincts!
I am an emotional creature, and I cannot deny it!
I have performed this bloody act for two lifetimes. I know what I am doing.
Here. Witness an example of true skill.
How absurd. I must show you half-wits how to fight in the midst of live combat.
The kill is mine!
Away with you! I will have this glory and you cannot stop me!
He who lands the killing blow is the one to claim the glory!
I have lost my will! My actions are misguided!
I am lost in a daze! I have lost purpose!
I have strayed from the path. I do not know the right course of action!
RAWR!!!
Behold, my demonic wrath!
I have a touch of death. Beware!
I have been given a second life and I risk it delving into these blackened catacombs.
What is honor if we are to die a horrible death...
The life of a warrior is too rife with risk. I should retire and become a farmer instead.
It is when I am most comfortable, that the killers and cutthroats decide to emerge.
Even when beaten and exhausted, I will not be an easy target for you.
Try as you might, the silence of night makes poor cover for your clumsy footsteps.
Brand me with the outcastâ€™s mark so that I may embody the suffering I hold within!
I bear many scars from many battles, but I hold the most grisly of them within!
I wear this mask to hide my shame, but I will bear the wounds of battle proudly!
You are not worthy of life. You are nothing.
Best me in combat and you will prove you are strong. You know you cannot.
In my home, you would be viewed as less than even the farmers.
I am a foreign visitor to these lands. Treat me with the utmost respect.
Give me the heads of your kills, so that I may present them and take credit.
You are all outcasts. You are beneath me and must serve my will.
I continue to think on the events of that night, and it continues to sadden me...
I never saw him again. I will never know why he did what he did...
All this killing, this bloodshed, it has eroded my soul...
Shall we slaughter a chicken and pay our dues to a bloodthirsty god?
Do you have a skewer? Souls taste best when roasted over hellfire.
Shing. Shing. I am imitating the battle cry of my weapon.
I am an unkillable man. Try to prove me wrong.
Try to harm me. I dare you.
I welcome the pain. I fear nothing.
Even if it will not restore my former glory, I will face death without fear...
I will be forgotten, but I will still die with dignity...
HAHAHAHAHA!
You are foolish to think that a vengeful spirit like me has a weakness!
Watch as I carve my own flesh, and know that you cannot hope to harm me.
I feel no pain. You do not believe me? Watch.
Cursed to a second life, perhaps it is best that I rest...
I have no hope of restoring my once proud image. This is the only option...
Haha! Bloody blades are my favorite delicacy!
I will rip my chest open, to prove that I am indeed a heartless demon!
You plot your escape route? I will not allow you!
With no smoke or mirrors, you will not escape my presence.
The coward's path leads to nothingness. What greater shame is there?
We will be greeted with contempt for our cowardice. Let us die a noble death...
Let us fight on! We will be remembered for our audacious nature!
Scars. Pain. Death. It is not to be feared, it is to be embraced!
I will not be banished! Not yet!
Wait! I have not had my fill!
My life flashes before me, just like that dreadful night!
Will I die a second time? Will there be a third life?!
So your ploy has begun? You seek to end my life here?
Your ambush begins, but I will not allow you victory!
You are my devoted serfs! You should be shielding me from danger!
Cowards! Eager to save yourselves rather than protect your lord!
Hahaha! I barely even felt that!
Oh, that will scar. Excellent!
Good try, but you should have aimed for the head.
They strike without salt and vinegar. Their attacks do not affect me!
I have died once already. It was not so bad.
Oof. That was a fatal blow, or was it? *wink wink*
If I am to die, let me die! I cannot stand this torture!
Kill me or let me live! Do not torment me like this!
I am no fool. Your monstrous allies are easy to predict.
I have faced your kind before. You always act the same.
What? Too scared to fight a demon?
I am a wide man. Surely it is not that hard to hit me.
Hehe. Trying to box with a shadow? Hehe.
Blades and claws tainted in darkness? Mmm, my favorite.
You fool! Now I must search for a different soul to claim!
You are proud of your triumph, but you only hinder me and my quest.
Did I say you could strike? I did not, you impudent child.
You attack recklessly, no discipline. You should feel ashamed.
Look at these simple creatures, fighting their meaningless fight. Haha!
Ah, the affairs of mortal beings. How quaint.
They have proven their skill in combat, let us leave now before it is too late!
A warrior knows when to back down, and it would be best that we do!
Merely an act. I know that you conspire with these monstrosities.
A convincing performance to some, but not to me.
Careless, brutish. You strike poorly and will be slain as a result.
*shakes head* You are an embarrassment to us all.
Phew. If you landed that blow, I would have been furious.
Nice try, but that kill is meant for someone more worthy, such as me.
Perhaps they are demons? Perhaps they are my kin?
Pft. Should have aimed for the heart.
Again and again, I am always last to suffer!
No! My peers and companions, slaughtered before me once more!
Good. That makes things simple.
Taken by the fiends. A fitting fate for a betrayer.
How does it feel? Is it like a sword through the heart?
Pain puts hair on the chest. I could use some too!
Let this be a lesson to all of you. Do not be this fool.
You lack grace, finesse. You are injured because you do not listen.
Oh yum! Let me suck on the wound!
Oh how kind of you to spill blood for me! I was getting rather parched!
An act of mercy? No, an act of torment! They toy with us!
We have not been maimed. Now is an opportune time to withdraw!
You do not fool me. Your prancing only serves to entertain me.
You think I believe your little act? I know real bloodlust when I see it.
Aw, no drink for me? Now I am sad.
Hehehe. Did you like my smoke bomb?
I am immobilized with fear! I am to suffer the same death again!
No, stop! I WANT OUT!
Moving me into the center of your trap? I will not fall for it.
You seek to put me in a disadvantageous position, but I will not allow it.
Hnnngh! No! I want to FEEEEEEEEEEEEL!
Sorry, my legs are shaking with pain and pleasure.
Be patient, you imp, or I will beat the patience into you.
Disobey me, and the end of my blade will be your new teacher.
Stop, unless you seek to be possessed demonically!
Halt! I am the warden and you need to get back into your cell!
Foreign medicines and apparatus are things I will not accept.
Hmm. Probably poisoned. I will pass.
What is this? AID?! No thanks.
Pft. I do not need this. I am a hardy man!
Do not give things to a vagrant, it is unwise...
You give to a lesser man. It will only hinder you in the future...
Ew. Bring me a stillborn child and we will talk.
Is it the key to my heart?
Your strange eldritch ways unnerve me.
I prefer traditional methods, not your unorthodox ones.
What is the cost of this treatment? I will not pay a debt that I do not know.
No! Let my heart bleed!
I am already dead, inside and out. Do not try to change me.
Away with you. You mettle in my affairs and it irritates me!
Why mend a broken soul? Let what is dying, die...
It is not enough. It will never be enough...
Heal my mind or heal nothing at all, for it is all pointless...
What kind of trickery is this? Flesh does not just magically heal!
I would like some herbal tea before we begin please.
Do you have anything to cure my undead state?
Gifts never come without a cost, and I suspect the cost is my life!
I have no need of aid, especially not that of a stranger!
Trying to appeal to my interests? I am not so easily swayed!
I do not need your aid to relish in this pain.
No. Let me enjoy my eternal suffering.
I do not need comfort. I will be strong.
To bolster me, would be to bolster a crumbling fortress...
It will not restore my honor. It will not restore who I am...
You would only be dragged down with me...
Your attempts to bless me will only end in my agonizing demise.
No no! What you are doing is an exorcism ritual. That is not what we want!
Please. I do not need to be stamped with seals of power.
It is fine to build relations with your allies, but do not let it be a hindrance.
Even in this dreary abode, know that you are worth something.
In my homeland, many die forgotten and unmourned. This will not happen to you.
I bear many scars from many encounters. Time will heal all your wounds.
After every battle, you must care to your wounds so that you may fight on.
I have mastered many techniques, but the art of healing is the most essential.
We are all lost in our ways, but soon we will find our path.
Do not let your camaraderie become a burden. I speak from experience.
Despite my dispassionate and grim demeanor, I do care for your well-being.
Thoughts of inadequacy plague my mind. I am sure to fail!
How can I call myself a master when I have faltered so much!
It is pointless. We are all doomed to the void and that time is now!
I have never needed help with my duty, and that will not change today.
Their ways are strange, and likely malicious in purpose.
I am alone in this strange place. I can trust no one.
I have been pulling out my teeth and cutting up my gums. Want to see?
These horns are very sharp. They will work nicely as hooks for my skin!
Let way. I must heat my blade so that it will cut cleanly into my flesh!
I will not let talentless fools drag me down with them.
I cannot hope to teach these mongrels anything.
Useless. These ones are too stubborn to learn my teachings.
I was a mentor to others once. Not anymore.
I have been alone for a decade. I can manage without them.
There is no benefit in aiding these outsiders.
I would only make things worse...
My touch is that of a vagrant. It would be best if I kept to myself...
For my services, one of you will have to offer me your firstborn.
Is there a lamb we can slaughter? It is mandatory.
WE BE DEMONS. That is all.
Devious. To disguise malice as good will is most cowardly.
Your methods are unconventional. I will not be subject to them.
Your dirty foreign hands will not touch me!
I like it rough.
Let us spar. You will use a blade, I will use my fists!
Here. Carve the mark of shame into my back!
I will not allow your grimey hands anywhere near me.
There is nothing you can do. Do not try to act otherwise.
You think you can help? I will inform you that you are terribly mistaken.
Please. It is not wise to offer kindness to a disgrace like me...
I am ashamed. I cannot possibly accept a kindness in this state...
I am worth less than an outcast. Leave me...
Pfft. Good luck, I am incorporeal!
Hissssssssss!
Poison in the grain. A coward's weapon.
This meal is laced in toxins. I know of your deceit.
I must trim the fat so that only muscle remains!
Fasting is a common practice in my homeland. I will demonstrate!
I am below even the peasants of my social caste. I do not deserve food...
I have no need for mortal food. I am already dead!
Bread and water will not sate me. I must feed on the hearts of my enemies!
You were promised coin for my head. Instead, you will taste the edge of my blade!
You. You are the assassin and your life ends now!
A disgraceful display. You deserve the death that comes for you!
Pitiful. To die by my hand is the only honor I can offer you!
You. Your soul is mine!
I am the Reaper, and I decree that your time is done!
I come closer to my redemption...
Find peace in death, it is the only mercy I can bestow.
I was master of my art, and I still am.
I am Death.
One by one, they will fall.
Another added to the tally.
I have had steel pierce my beating heart, I am no mortal man.
I see how I will depart. Shamed and forgotten...
I must survive! I must redeem my name and fix my past mistakes!
Do what must be done. My sacrifice will restore the honor I have lost so long ago.

Will I finally be laid to rest?
A Man Made Demon
An assassin from foreign lands, wielding a peculiar weapon of blade and chain. It is unknown what his intentions are in our pitiful estate, but he offers his grisly expertise to your cause.
The Dishonored
Stripped of their nobility and banished from their homes, these wandering warriors seek to save what little dignity they have left by joining the broken ranks of your estate.

The man I was is no more. Compassion is a weakness that will lead to failure.
I am as silent as the sleeping dead. My foes will be unbeknownst to their demise.
I have slain many to redeem myself. I am a quick and efficient killer.
Even in pure blackness, the darkest caverns can be navigated.

Garment

Believed to have been killed more than a decade ago, the Wraith is a man seeking to redeem his dishonored name by serving as his masterâ€™s personal assassin. Years of heartless slaughter has shaped him into a brutal and efficient killer. Using an intricate weapon made to counter his most common targets, the Wraith ensnares his victims in tightening chains before delivering a fatal blow with the bladed side of his wicked tool.

The Wraith travels to many faraway places to fulfill the grisly deeds given to him by his masters. As a result, he sacrifices the heavier armor commonly worn by warriors of his homeland in favor of lighter attire that also allows him the freedom of movement to use his deadly weapon. The blade and chain he wields is used with frightening flexibility. He can fling the bladed side to lacerate and execute his victims or use the blunt side as a flail to incapacitate his foes.

A menacing assassin with no emotions, the Wraith has learned to be most effective in the dark of the night. He is eerily silent despite his physique, and he uses this to his advantage. He can strike unseen from the shadows, besting even creatures that live entirely in blackness.

ÐžÐ½ Ð¼Ð¾Ð¶ÐµÑ‚ Ð½Ð°Ð½Ð¾ÑÐ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ð½ÐµÐ²Ð¸Ð´Ð¸Ð¼Ñ‹Ðµ ÑƒÐ´Ð°Ñ€Ñ‹ Ð¸Ð· Ñ‚ÐµÐ½Ð¸, Ð¿Ð¾Ð±ÐµÐ¶Ð´Ð°Ñ Ð´Ð°Ð¶Ðµ ÑÑƒÑ‰ÐµÑÑ‚Ð², Ð¶Ð¸Ð²ÑƒÑ‰Ð¸Ñ… Ñ‚Ð°Ð¼.
A worthless kill. It does not lessen the price I must pay.
I will die a second time, and it will be as pathetic as my first death!
I have not paid my full due! I will die forgotten!
I have collected a decade's worth of souls, yet it will all be for nothing!
I have traded hundreds of lives for my own, but it will not save me in this moment!
Have the Shoguns sent you?! Have they broken their deal?!
You seek to end me? I will not allow such when I am so close to redemption!
Hmph. Spineless assassins, sent to ensure I never finish my deed.
Betrayal is afoot. I will not be fooled again.
Come to claim the bounty on my head? It will be your last mistake.
I was stabbed through the heart, and it was the best thing I had ever felt.
These chains wrap tightly around me. It is pleasing.
I am always in agony, and I have learned to find solace in it.
Where there is pain, there can be pleasure.
In the anguish of my punctured heart, I have found peace.
Insufferable. You have not been trained properly for this task.
You let emotion drive your actions. You are undisciplined, unskilled.
You are all disappointments. Glimmers of potential, snuffed out by incompetence.
You have no pride, no honor. You follow the same damned path as I do.
I have fallen from grace, and now I must sulk in the dark with these wretches.
I will offer the heads of men, women, and children to redeem my name.
The life of these peasants to restore my glory? I would accept without hesitation.
I failed because I cared for another. That will not happen again.
I am uncaring, distanced, remorseless.
I have been given a task, and I will complete it no matter the sacrifice.
Even after a decade of unfeeling slaughter, I still yearn for his touch...
I had become too attached, and it twisted me into the monster I am now...
My students...I was weak, and I failed them all...
Behind this grim visage, a broken man...
My heart, it still aches for the love I thought I shared...
I am the reaper. I am the jailor. I AM DEATH!
I have died once already! I am a vengeful revenant on the hunt for blood!
Is this the afterlife? If so, it is rather droll.
I am an unholy creature, a demon walking the earth!
I am the Aspect of Death! All will fall to my blade!
Combat is an art, and I have mastered it to the fullest.
My name will be remembered. My past mistakes will be erased!
Hmph, I have seen worse.
I have killed many men, all of which were far more fearsome than this rabble.
I am close to paying my debt in full. I cannot fail now.
My name will be redeemed. I will be remembered as an honorable warrior.
I am a monster of a man. These beasts will know fear.
I do not flinch in the face of terror. I do not hesitate to kill.
I have survived a fatal blow in the past. What more could possibly stop me.
Only when my past sins have been cleansed will I finally accept my second death.
I have died once already. I have no reason to fear death again.
My younger self would struggle to face such horrors, but I am not that man.
I am fearless in the face of demonic entities. Let my courage inspire you.
A master leads through action. Let my bravery serve as your guide.
Strike with purpose. An attack is useless if it lacks conviction.
There is always a weakness. Find it and you will be the victor.
Emotions are a powerful thing. Use them to your benefit.
Know that to die with honor is a greater fate than to live in cowardice!
Hmph, I will shrug it off.
This is nothing I have not dealt with before.
We will die as cowards, forgotten in this domain of demons!
In all my years, I have never fought a foe so baleful, so malevolent!
There will be no glory in our deaths. Only torment and suffering!
You work for the Shoguns, and you have come to ensure the debt is never paid!
You seek to undermine my task! I will let no one stop me from restoring my honor!
I trusted another once, and it led to my first death. That will not happen again!
Death is so, so cold. Pain will allow me to feel warmth again!
Where a heart would be, I bear a scar instead, for pain invokes the strongest emotions!
The blade. It is a beautiful mistress that can take away the burdens of life!
I was a teacher once, but there is nothing I could teach to fools like you.
I have sacrificed my humanity to redeem my name. What have you accomplished?
You will die as I have. Shamed and forgotten.
If the Shoguns decreed it, I would offer them your lives in a heartbeat.
I have killed many innocents in my quest to preserve my honor. I do not plan to stop.
My reputation is what matters. I will be praised in my first life and feared in this one.
Even if I restore my name, the killing will burden me for the rest of my years...
I was to guide a new generation to glory, but instead I lead them to their demise...
I was praised, respected, and I foolishly threw it all away...
Innocent souls taste the best. So juicy and succulent!
This chain is wrapped around my arm twelve times. That is twice more than six!
I prefer my demonic deities over your eldritch entities.
The shadows serve as my ally. The unseen warrior is the one to live!
Flee as a coward or die as a coward, the choice is obvious!
Peril presents itself, and I must survive!
I must keep a watchful eye, lest you fiends decide to end my life abruptly!
I have dealt with rival assassins before, I will not be so easily caught!
You are honorless vermin. I will not allow you to stab me in the back!
Death was not so bad. A second death should be as painless as the first!
I know no fear. I will face these creatures head on!
An exemplary warrior would not back down in the face of such ferocity!
Demonic brethren! Let us embrace each other!
Come closer, I wish to taste your fear.
Haha! Look at how they flee before me!
Like an unholy phantom, I will vanish from sight.
Noooooooo! They bear the symbols of my anathema!
The Light is too bright! I will retreat to the shadows!
What little honor I have left, I will preserve with a selfless sacrifice...
My name is in ruins. I may as well accept my fate and be forgotten...
As who I was fades away, so too shall I...
I-I am shameful! I seek to flee from this hellscape!
I-I am a coward! I do not possess the will to complete what must be done!
T-they speak the truth! I am a lowly rat, fleeing to the safety of the shadows!
The kill belongs to me! Every life I take brings me closer to my goal!
I am a true warrior! Move aside!
I will be the one to strike the final blow!
You will face danger first, seeing as you have little to attribute to your name.
I have learned that the key to survival is to let a fool take your place!
A teacher watches his students, and you will be my student today!
The fear of failure, of my wasted efforts, it paralyzes me!
I-it happens once more! My emotions cause me to hesitate!
Memories return! Flashes of that terrible night!
He who strikes first, will surely fall for the traitor's trap.
A preemptive strike is too risky. I will wait for the rats to reveal themselves.
I am a patient man. The assassins will strike and I will steal their final breath.
A master should not have to waste his efforts.
I am getting on in years. You younger ones can take over in my place.
I have a deadened heart. Give me a moment to rest.
I have done this dreadful deed for years, and I have lost all hope to completing it...
Years later, I still hesitate to do what must be done...
I must remain still, like a lion's statue.
If I do not move, they will fail to detect me.
They will get over here. I must simply wait.
Your orders will lead me to an untimely demise. I will do what I know is best!
I will not obey someone so young and naive!
In this strange land I listen to only one master, and that is me!
Passion of a different nature takes over me!
I am a feral animal, unable to deny my basest instincts!
I am an emotional creature, and I cannot deny it!
I have performed this bloody act for two lifetimes. I know what I am doing.
Here. Witness an example of true skill.
How absurd. I must show you half-wits how to fight in the midst of live combat.
The kill is mine!
Away with you! I will have this glory and you cannot stop me!
He who lands the killing blow is the one to claim the glory!
I have lost my will! My actions are misguided!
I am lost in a daze! I have lost purpose!
I have strayed from the path. I do not know the right course of action!
RAWR!!!
Behold, my demonic wrath!
I have a touch of death. Beware!
I have been given a second life and I risk it delving into these blackened catacombs.
What is honor if we are to die a horrible death...
The life of a warrior is too rife with risk. I should retire and become a farmer instead.
It is when I am most comfortable, that the killers and cutthroats decide to emerge.
Even when beaten and exhausted, I will not be an easy target for you.
Try as you might, the silence of night makes poor cover for your clumsy footsteps.
Brand me with the outcastâ€™s mark so that I may embody the suffering I hold within!
I bear many scars from many battles, but I hold the most grisly of them within!
I wear this mask to hide my shame, but I will bear the wounds of battle proudly!
You are not worthy of life. You are nothing.
Best me in combat and you will prove you are strong. You know you cannot.
In my home, you would be viewed as less than even the farmers.
I am a foreign visitor to these lands. Treat me with the utmost respect.
Give me the heads of your kills, so that I may present them and take credit.
You are all outcasts. You are beneath me and must serve my will.
I continue to think on the events of that night, and it continues to sadden me...
I never saw him again. I will never know why he did what he did...
All this killing, this bloodshed, it has eroded my soul...
Shall we slaughter a chicken and pay our dues to a bloodthirsty god?
Do you have a skewer? Souls taste best when roasted over hellfire.
Shing. Shing. I am imitating the battle cry of my weapon.
I am an unkillable man. Try to prove me wrong.
Try to harm me. I dare you.
I welcome the pain. I fear nothing.
Even if it will not restore my former glory, I will face death without fear...
I will be forgotten, but I will still die with dignity...
HAHAHAHAHA!
You are foolish to think that a vengeful spirit like me has a weakness!
Watch as I carve my own flesh, and know that you cannot hope to harm me.
I feel no pain. You do not believe me? Watch.
Cursed to a second life, perhaps it is best that I rest...
I have no hope of restoring my once proud image. This is the only option...
Haha! Bloody blades are my favorite delicacy!
I will rip my chest open, to prove that I am indeed a heartless demon!
You plot your escape route? I will not allow you!
With no smoke or mirrors, you will not escape my presence.
The coward's path leads to nothingness. What greater shame is there?
We will be greeted with contempt for our cowardice. Let us die a noble death...
Let us fight on! We will be remembered for our audacious nature!
Scars. Pain. Death. It is not to be feared, it is to be embraced!
I will not be banished! Not yet!
Wait! I have not had my fill!
My life flashes before me, just like that dreadful night!
Will I die a second time? Will there be a third life?!
So your ploy has begun? You seek to end my life here?
Your ambush begins, but I will not allow you victory!
You are my devoted serfs! You should be shielding me from danger!
Cowards! Eager to save yourselves rather than protect your lord!
Hahaha! I barely even felt that!
Oh, that will scar. Excellent!
Good try, but you should have aimed for the head.
They strike without salt and vinegar. Their attacks do not affect me!
I have died once already. It was not so bad.
Oof. That was a fatal blow, or was it? *wink wink*
If I am to die, let me die! I cannot stand this torture!
Kill me or let me live! Do not torment me like this!
I am no fool. Your monstrous allies are easy to predict.
I have faced your kind before. You always act the same.
What? Too scared to fight a demon?
I am a wide man. Surely it is not that hard to hit me.
Hehe. Trying to box with a shadow? Hehe.
Blades and claws tainted in darkness? Mmm, my favorite.
You fool! Now I must search for a different soul to claim!
You are proud of your triumph, but you only hinder me and my quest.
Did I say you could strike? I did not, you impudent child.
You attack recklessly, no discipline. You should feel ashamed.
Look at these simple creatures, fighting their meaningless fight. Haha!
Ah, the affairs of mortal beings. How quaint.
They have proven their skill in combat, let us leave now before it is too late!
A warrior knows when to back down, and it would be best that we do!
Merely an act. I know that you conspire with these monstrosities.
A convincing performance to some, but not to me.
Careless, brutish. You strike poorly and will be slain as a result.
*shakes head* You are an embarrassment to us all.
Phew. If you landed that blow, I would have been furious.
Nice try, but that kill is meant for someone more worthy, such as me.
Perhaps they are demons? Perhaps they are my kin?
Pft. Should have aimed for the heart.
Again and again, I am always last to suffer!
No! My peers and companions, slaughtered before me once more!
Good. That makes things simple.
Taken by the fiends. A fitting fate for a betrayer.
How does it feel? Is it like a sword through the heart?
Pain puts hair on the chest. I could use some too!
Let this be a lesson to all of you. Do not be this fool.
You lack grace, finesse. You are injured because you do not listen.
Oh yum! Let me suck on the wound!
Oh how kind of you to spill blood for me! I was getting rather parched!
An act of mercy? No, an act of torment! They toy with us!
We have not been maimed. Now is an opportune time to withdraw!
You do not fool me. Your prancing only serves to entertain me.
You think I believe your little act? I know real bloodlust when I see it.
Aw, no drink for me? Now I am sad.
Hehehe. Did you like my smoke bomb?
I am immobilized with fear! I am to suffer the same death again!
No, stop! I WANT OUT!
Moving me into the center of your trap? I will not fall for it.
You seek to put me in a disadvantageous position, but I will not allow it.
Hnnngh! No! I want to FEEEEEEEEEEEEL!
Sorry, my legs are shaking with pain and pleasure.
Be patient, you imp, or I will beat the patience into you.
Disobey me, and the end of my blade will be your new teacher.
Stop, unless you seek to be possessed demonically!
Halt! I am the warden and you need to get back into your cell!
Foreign medicines and apparatus are things I will not accept.
Hmm. Probably poisoned. I will pass.
What is this? AID?! No thanks.
Pft. I do not need this. I am a hardy man!
Do not give things to a vagrant, it is unwise...
You give to a lesser man. It will only hinder you in the future...
Ew. Bring me a stillborn child and we will talk.
Is it the key to my heart?
Your strange eldritch ways unnerve me.
I prefer traditional methods, not your unorthodox ones.
What is the cost of this treatment? I will not pay a debt that I do not know.
No! Let my heart bleed!
I am already dead, inside and out. Do not try to change me.
Away with you. You mettle in my affairs and it irritates me!
Why mend a broken soul? Let what is dying, die...
It is not enough. It will never be enough...
Heal my mind or heal nothing at all, for it is all pointless...
What kind of trickery is this? Flesh does not just magically heal!
I would like some herbal tea before we begin please.
Do you have anything to cure my undead state?
Gifts never come without a cost, and I suspect the cost is my life!
I have no need of aid, especially not that of a stranger!
Trying to appeal to my interests? I am not so easily swayed!
I do not need your aid to relish in this pain.
No. Let me enjoy my eternal suffering.
I do not need comfort. I will be strong.
To bolster me, would be to bolster a crumbling fortress...
It will not restore my honor. It will not restore who I am...
You would only be dragged down with me...
Your attempts to bless me will only end in my agonizing demise.
No no! What you are doing is an exorcism ritual. That is not what we want!
Please. I do not need to be stamped with seals of power.
It is fine to build relations with your allies, but do not let it be a hindrance.
Even in this dreary abode, know that you are worth something.
In my homeland, many die forgotten and unmourned. This will not happen to you.
I bear many scars from many encounters. Time will heal all your wounds.
After every battle, you must care to your wounds so that you may fight on.
I have mastered many techniques, but the art of healing is the most essential.
We are all lost in our ways, but soon we will find our path.
Do not let your camaraderie become a burden. I speak from experience.
Despite my dispassionate and grim demeanor, I do care for your well-being.
Thoughts of inadequacy plague my mind. I am sure to fail!
How can I call myself a master when I have faltered so much!
It is pointless. We are all doomed to the void and that time is now!
I have never needed help with my duty, and that will not change today.
Their ways are strange, and likely malicious in purpose.
I am alone in this strange place. I can trust no one.
I have been pulling out my teeth and cutting up my gums. Want to see?
These horns are very sharp. They will work nicely as hooks for my skin!
Let way. I must heat my blade so that it will cut cleanly into my flesh!
I will not let talentless fools drag me down with them.
I cannot hope to teach these mongrels anything.
Useless. These ones are too stubborn to learn my teachings.
I was a mentor to others once. Not anymore.
I have been alone for a decade. I can manage without them.
There is no benefit in aiding these outsiders.
I would only make things worse...
My touch is that of a vagrant. It would be best if I kept to myself...
For my services, one of you will have to offer me your firstborn.
Is there a lamb we can slaughter? It is mandatory.
WE BE DEMONS. That is all.
Devious. To disguise malice as good will is most cowardly.
Your methods are unconventional. I will not be subject to them.
Your dirty foreign hands will not touch me!
I like it rough.
Let us spar. You will use a blade, I will use my fists!
Here. Carve the mark of shame into my back!
I will not allow your grimey hands anywhere near me.
There is nothing you can do. Do not try to act otherwise.
You think you can help? I will inform you that you are terribly mistaken.
Please. It is not wise to offer kindness to a disgrace like me...
I am ashamed. I cannot possibly accept a kindness in this state...
I am worth less than an outcast. Leave me...
Pfft. Good luck, I am incorporeal!
Hissssssssss!
Poison in the grain. A coward's weapon.
This meal is laced in toxins. I know of your deceit.
I must trim the fat so that only muscle remains!
Fasting is a common practice in my homeland. I will demonstrate!
I am below even the peasants of my social caste. I do not deserve food...
I have no need for mortal food. I am already dead!
Bread and water will not sate me. I must feed on the hearts of my enemies!
You were promised coin for my head. Instead, you will taste the edge of my blade!
You. You are the assassin and your life ends now!
A disgraceful display. You deserve the death that comes for you!
Pitiful. To die by my hand is the only honor I can offer you!
You. Your soul is mine!
I am the Reaper, and I decree that your time is done!
I come closer to my redemption...
Find peace in death, it is the only mercy I can bestow.
I was master of my art, and I still am.
I am Death.
One by one, they will fall.
Another added to the tally.
I have had steel pierce my beating heart, I am no mortal man.
I see how I will depart. Shamed and forgotten...
I must survive! I must redeem my name and fix my past mistakes!
Do what must be done. My sacrifice will restore the honor I have lost so long ago.

Will I finally be laid to rest?
A Man Made Demon
An assassin from foreign lands, wielding a peculiar weapon of blade and chain. It is unknown what his intentions are in our pitiful estate, but he offers his grisly expertise to your cause.
The Dishonored
Stripped of their nobility and banished from their homes, these wandering warriors seek to save what little dignity they have left by joining the broken ranks of your estate.

The man I was is no more. Compassion is a weakness that will lead to failure.
I am as silent as the sleeping dead. My foes will be unbeknownst to their demise.
I have slain many to redeem myself. I am a quick and efficient killer.
Even in pure blackness, the darkest caverns can be navigated.

Believed to have been killed more than a decade ago, the Wraith is a man seeking to redeem his dishonored name by serving as his masterâ€™s personal assassin. Years of heartless slaughter has shaped him into a brutal and efficient killer. Using an intricate weapon made to counter his most common targets, the Wraith ensnares his victims in tightening chains before delivering a fatal blow with the bladed side of his wicked tool.

The Wraith travels to many faraway places to fulfill the grisly deeds given to him by his masters. As a result, he sacrifices the heavier armor commonly worn by warriors of his homeland in favor of lighter attire that also allows him the freedom of movement to use his deadly weapon. The blade and chain he wields is used with frightening flexibility. He can fling the bladed side to lacerate and execute his victims or use the blunt side as a flail to incapacitate his foes.

A menacing assassin with no emotions, the Wraith has learned to be most effective in the dark of the night. He is eerily silent despite his physique, and he uses this to his advantage. He can strike unseen from the shadows, besting even creatures that live entirely in blackness.
